expo.name: Travel planner
expo.description: This is a mobile trip planner application created for Comp3130. This application allows you to select from a variety of locations and add existing or new activities to the locations to your wish list to assist in planning trips. Indented platform => Pixel 4XL (Android studio full name: Pixel 4XL API 30). Intended operating system => Android 11.0x86 (Release name R). Intended orientation => Portrait. All information provided in the app is sample data. Any resemblance to actual persons, places or things, current, past or future, is entirely coincidental.
